mapper.insert: insert into product(product_name, product_desc, img_path, normal_price, promotion_price, priority, create_time, last_edit_time, enable_status, product_category_id, shop_id) VALUES (#{productName}, #{productDesc}, #{imgPath}, #{normalPrice}, #{promotionPrice}, #{priority}, #{createTime}, #{lastEditTime}, #{enableStatus}, #{productCategoryId}, #{shopId});
mapper.select: select product_id, product_name, product_desc, img_path, normal_price, promotion_price, priority, create_time, last_edit_time, enable_status, product_category_id, shop_id from product where product_id = #{productId};
select product_id, product_name, product_desc, normal_price, promotion_price, priority, last_edit_time, enable_status from product where shop_id = #{shopId} order by priority desc
